Description: On I-95 at mile marker 163.1 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north left shoulder is closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 171.7 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to an incident. The north center lane and right center lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Other Traffic

Description: On I-495 at mile marker 49 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 29 in the County of Washington, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south exit 29 narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash
